A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not the movie I was looking for.  Wish I could Jedi Mind Trick Rian Johnson into redoing this horrendous mess.\n\nThere were plotholes large enough to fly the Millenium Falcon through.  Humor that isn't funny and doesn't work for a Star Wars movie.  Punchable new characters like Jar Jar 2.0 or otherwise known as Rose.  Rey is suddenly a master jedi without any training.  Not enough battle scenes and no real villian to look forward to in the next movie.
